title: Bug 26222[Navigator] Goto resource should work on the package view as well.
description: Build id: 200211130841Open a Java Perspective.Enable the Resource Navigation action set.Activate Navigator.The goto type is disabled.Activate the Hierarchy view.Go to resource is enabled ( should be disabled).The goto resource should work only if Navigator is active. And the package viewshould be able to plug a handler for that action so that Go to resource can beused in the package view also since it shows resources.
